017package org.apache.juneau.msgpack;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.msgpack.DataType.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.function.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
033
034/**
035 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link MsgPackParser}.
036 *
037 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
038 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
039 * </ul>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
042 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/MessagePackBasics">MessagePack Basics</a>
043
044 * </ul>
045 */
046@SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes", "unchecked" })
047public class MsgPackParserSession extends InputStreamParserSession {
048
049   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
050   // Static
051   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
052
053   /**
054    * Creates a new builder for this object.
055    *
056    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
057    * @return A new builder.
058    */
059   public static Builder create(MsgPackParser ctx) {
060      return new Builder(ctx);
061   }
062
063   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
064   // Builder
065   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
066
067   /**
068    * Builder class.
069    */
070   @FluentSetters
071   public static class Builder extends InputStreamParserSession.Builder {
072
073      MsgPackParser ctx;
074
075      /**
076       * Constructor
077       *
078       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
079       */
080      protected Builder(MsgPackParser ctx) {
081         super(ctx);
082         this.ctx = ctx;
083      }
084
085      @Override
086      public MsgPackParserSession build() {
087         return new MsgPackParserSession(this);
088      }
089
090      // <FluentSetters>
091
092      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
093      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
094         super.apply(type, apply);
095         return this;
096      }
097
098      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
099      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
100         super.debug(value);
101         return this;
102      }
103
104      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
105      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
106         super.properties(value);
107         return this;
108      }
109
110      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
111      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
112         super.property(key, value);
113         return this;
114      }
115
116      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
117      public Builder unmodifiable() {
118         super.unmodifiable();
119         return this;
120      }
121
122      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
123      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
124         super.locale(value);
125         return this;
126      }
127
128      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
129      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
130         super.localeDefault(value);
131         return this;
132      }
133
134      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
135      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
136         super.mediaType(value);
137         return this;
138      }
139
140      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
141      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
142         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
143         return this;
144      }
145
146      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
147      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
148         super.timeZone(value);
149         return this;
150      }
151
152      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
153      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
154         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
155         return this;
156      }
157
158      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
159      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
160         super.javaMethod(value);
161         return this;
162      }
163
164      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
165      public Builder outer(Object value) {
166         super.outer(value);
167         return this;
168      }
169
170      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
171      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
172         super.schema(value);
173         return this;
174      }
175
176      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
177      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
178         super.schemaDefault(value);
179         return this;
180      }
181
182      // </FluentSetters>
183   }
184
185   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
186   // Instance
187   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
188
189   /**
190    * Constructor.
191    *
192    * @param builder The builder for this object.
193    */
194   protected MsgPackParserSession(Builder builder) {
195      super(builder);
196   }
197
198   @Override /* ParserSession */
199   protected <T> T doParse(ParserPipe pipe, ClassMeta<T> type) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
200      try (MsgPackInputStream is = new MsgPackInputStream(pipe)) {
201         return parseAnything(type, is, getOuter(), null);
202      }
203   }
204
205   /*
206    * Workhorse method.
207    */
208   private <T> T parseAnything(ClassMeta<?> eType, MsgPackInputStream is, Object outer, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
209
210      if (eType == null)
211         eType = object();
212      ObjectSwap<T,Object> swap = (ObjectSwap<T,Object>)eType.getSwap(this);
213      BuilderSwap<T,Object> builder = (BuilderSwap<T,Object>)eType.getBuilderSwap(this);
214      ClassMeta<?> sType = null;
215      if (builder != null)
216         sType = builder.getBuilderClassMeta(this);
217      else if (swap != null)
218         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
219      else
220         sType = eType;
221
222      if (sType.isOptional())
223         return (T)Utils.opt(parseAnything(eType.getElementType(), is, outer, pMeta));
224
225      setCurrentClass(sType);
226
227      Object o = null;
228      DataType dt = is.readDataType();
229      int length = (int)is.readLength();
230
231      if (dt != DataType.NULL) {
232         if (dt == BOOLEAN)
233            o = is.readBoolean();
234         else if (dt == INT)
235            o = is.readInt();
236         else if (dt == LONG)
237            o = is.readLong();
238         else if (dt == FLOAT)
239            o = is.readFloat();
240         else if (dt == DOUBLE)
241            o = is.readDouble();
242         else if (dt == STRING)
243            o = trim(is.readString());
244         else if (dt == BIN)
245            o = is.readBinary();
246         else if (dt == ARRAY && sType.isObject()) {
247            JsonList jl = new JsonList(this);
248            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
249               jl.add(parseAnything(object(), is, outer, pMeta));
250            o = jl;
251         } else if (dt == MAP && sType.isObject()) {
252            JsonMap jm = new JsonMap(this);
253            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
254               jm.put((String)parseAnything(string(), is, outer, pMeta), parseAnything(object(), is, jm, pMeta));
255            o = cast(jm, pMeta, eType);
256         }
257
258         if (sType.isObject()) {
259            // Do nothing.
260         } else if (sType.isBoolean() || sType.isCharSequence() || sType.isChar() || sType.isNumber() || sType.isByteArray()) {
261            o = convertToType(o, sType);
262         } else if (sType.isMap()) {
263            if (dt == MAP) {
264               Map m = (sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer) ? (Map)sType.newInstance(outer) : newGenericMap(sType));
265               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
266                  Object key = parseAnything(sType.getKeyType(), is, outer, pMeta);
267                  ClassMeta<?> vt = sType.getValueType();
268                  Object value = parseAnything(vt, is, m, pMeta);
269                  setName(vt, value, key);
270                  m.put(key, value);
271               }
272               o = m;
273            } else {
274               throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid data type {0} encountered for parse type {1}", dt, sType);
275            }
276         } else if (builder != null || sType.canCreateNewBean(outer)) {
277            if (dt == MAP) {
278               BeanMap m = builder == null ? newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass()) : toBeanMap(builder.create(this, eType));
279               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
280                  String pName = parseAnything(string(), is, m.getBean(false), null);
281                  BeanPropertyMeta bpm = m.getPropertyMeta(pName);
282                  if (bpm == null) {
283                     if (pName.equals(getBeanTypePropertyName(eType)))
284                        parseAnything(string(), is, null, null);
285                     else
286                        onUnknownProperty(pName, m, parseAnything(string(), is, null, null));
287                  } else {
288                     ClassMeta<?> cm = bpm.getClassMeta();
289                     Object value = parseAnything(cm, is, m.getBean(false), bpm);
290                     setName(cm, value, pName);
291                     try {
292                        bpm.set(m, pName, value);
293                     } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
294                        onBeanSetterException(pMeta, e);
295                        throw e;
296                     }
297                  }
298               }
299               o = builder == null ? m.getBean() : builder.build(this, m.getBean(), eType);
300            } else {
301               throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid data type {0} encountered for parse type {1}", dt, sType);
302            }
303         } else if (sType.canCreateNewInstanceFromString(outer) && dt == STRING) {
304            o = sType.newInstanceFromString(outer, o == null ? "" : o.toString());
305         } else if (sType.isCollection()) {
306            if (dt == MAP) {
307               JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
308               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
309                  m.put((String)parseAnything(string(), is, outer, pMeta), parseAnything(object(), is, m, pMeta));
310               o = cast(m, pMeta, eType);
311            } else if (dt == ARRAY) {
312               Collection l = (
313                  sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer)
314                  ? (Collection)sType.newInstance()
315                  : new JsonList(this)
316               );
317               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
318                  l.add(parseAnything(sType.getElementType(), is, l, pMeta));
319               o = l;
320            } else {
321               throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid data type {0} encountered for parse type {1}", dt, sType);
322            }
323         } else if (sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs()) {
324            if (dt == MAP) {
325               JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
326               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
327                  m.put((String)parseAnything(string(), is, outer, pMeta), parseAnything(object(), is, m, pMeta));
328               o = cast(m, pMeta, eType);
329            } else if (dt == ARRAY) {
330               Collection l = (
331                  sType.isCollection() && sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer)
332                  ? (Collection)sType.newInstance()
333                  : new JsonList(this)
334               );
335               for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
336                  l.add(parseAnything(sType.isArgs() ? sType.getArg(i) : sType.getElementType(), is, l, pMeta));
337               o = toArray(sType, l);
338            } else {
339               throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid data type {0} encountered for parse type {1}", dt, sType);
340            }
341         } else if (dt == MAP) {
342            JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
343            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
344               m.put((String)parseAnything(string(), is, outer, pMeta), parseAnything(object(), is, m, pMeta));
345            if (m.containsKey(getBeanTypePropertyName(eType)))
346               o = cast(m, pMeta, eType);
347            else if (sType.getProxyInvocationHandler() != null)
348               o = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass()).load(m).getBean();
349            else
350               throw new ParseException(this, "Class ''{0}'' could not be instantiated.  Reason: ''{1}''",
351                  sType.getInnerClass().getName(), sType.getNotABeanReason());
352         } else {
353            throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid data type {0} encountered for parse type {1}", dt, sType);
354         }
355      }
356
357      if (swap != null && o != null)
358         o = unswap(swap, o, eType);
359
360      if (outer != null)
361         setParent(eType, o, outer);
362
363      return (T)o;
364   }
365}
